original_text: So all the people who were in the city were called together to pursue them, and as they pursued Joshua they were drawn away from the city.
korean_text: 그 성읍에 있는 모든 백성이 그들을 추격하려고 모여 여호수아를 추격하며 유인함을 받아 아이 성읍을 멀리 떠나니

sentences.original_text: So all the people who were in the city were called together to pursue them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 성 안에 있던 모든 백성이 그들을 쫓기 위해 함께 소집되었고

sentences.original_text: they were drawn away from the city.
